rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, Meleph,
have you known Zeke for a while?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes, though we never spoke directly,
I was familiar with his appearance.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0003
rows.name:
If I recall, he paid a formal
visit to our country not long
after leaving Luxuria, correct?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0004
rows.name: Yes, you're right about that...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0005
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0006
rows.name: What was he like back then?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0007
rows.name: Were you not interested in him, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0101
rows.name: Let me think...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0102
rows.name:
As I recall, you received a report about
the arrest of a suspicious man dressed
in black with an odd manner of speech.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0103
rows.name:
Ah, yes...
He was apprehended by guards at the
palace gates and nearly thrown in jail.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0104
rows.name:
Sounds like he was just as
suspicious-looking then
as he is now...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0105
rows.name:
It's fortunate he was so forgiving,
otherwise it could have escalated
into a diplomatic crisis.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0106
rows.name:
Indeed.
We should be thankful
for his graciousness.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0107
rows.name:
That sounds just like Zeke though.
I can totally picture it.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0109
rows.name:
Hehehe, that's nothing compared
to my Prince's other
legendary mishaps!

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0110
rows.name: You're saying there are worse ones?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0111
rows.name:
Oh, plenty!
He's basically misfortune personified.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0112
rows.name:
Like when he visited Invidia and they
mistook him for a rookie mercenary,
forcing him into a training exercise.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0113
rows.name:
The Prince was actually delighted,
saying it was a rare chance experiencing
another nation's training regimen.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0114
rows.name:
But for me,
it was an absolute nightmare...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0115
rows.name:
The food was basically Armu fodder,
and they didn't even have baths...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0116
rows.name: That sounds dreadful.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0117
rows.name:
But considering that even after
such treatment, he didn't turn it
into a diplomatic crisis...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0118
rows.name:
Zeke must have quite
a remarkable temperament.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0119
rows.name:
I think he probably just
didn't give it any thought...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0120
rows.name: I don't think that's true at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0121
rows.name:
It's incredible how he can turn
any situation into motivation
to keep going forward!

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0122
rows.name:
The Prince would be in tears
if he heard you say that...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0201
rows.name: I was curious about him...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0202
rows.name:
He was already renowned as Luxuria's
finest Driver at that time.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0203
rows.name:
I would have liked to spar with him,
but I had my duties to attend to.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0204
rows.name:
I was curious about him too, but...
a missed opportunity, certainly.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0205
rows.name: Do you still want to spar with him now?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0206
rows.name: Not really...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0207
rows.name:
Now I can observe his skills
firsthand at my side.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0208
rows.name: I think he's very reliable.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0209
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0210
rows.name:
His personality may be a bit eccentric,
but his abilities are undeniable.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0211
rows.name:
Oh, that's too bad...
I would have liked
to see you two face off.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0213
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0214
rows.name:
If the chance arises,
I wouldn't mind sparring with Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0215
rows.name:
You could call it mutual improvement...
It's good to know each other's
strengths and weaknesses.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0216
rows.name:
Rex... Don't egg Meleph-sama on like
that. She tends to take everything
at face value.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0217
rows.name: My bad...
